title: How Many Calories in Rum?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in rum per standard 44 ml serving, including full nutrition facts, equivalents, and variations for different proofs.
assumptions: 40% ABV (80 proof) distilled rum, unflavored, standard serving of 44 ml (1.5 fl oz shot).
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by proof, brand, flavoring, and serving size; mixers add extra calories. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: A standard 44 ml shot of 80-proof rum contains 97 calories, all from alcohol.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in a shot of rum?
faqs.a: About 97 kcal for a 44 ml shot of 80-proof rum.

faqs.q: Does rum have carbohydrates or sugar?
faqs.a: Pure rum has 0 g carbs and 0 g sugars; flavored varieties may add some.

faqs.q: How does proof affect calories in rum?
faqs.a: Higher proof means more alcohol and calories; e.g., 100-proof has ~25% more than 80-proof.

faqs.q: Are there fats or proteins in rum?
faqs.a: No, rum contains 0 g fat and 0 g protein.

faqs.q: How many calories in 100 ml of rum?
